section.title: Upload Process
section.para: The following steps are required for uploading the new version to the server:

orderedlist.listitem: Upload programs: Upload keymandeveloper7-0-x-0.exe, keymandesktoplight7-0-x-0.exe, keymandesktoppro7-0-x-0.exe to s:\tavultesoft\website\dec2004\downloads
Edit news items: Edit news items in Corp
